title: Blog Utilization in Online Learning: Project-Based Social Domain Competency Strengthening

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate-level expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Learners are office workers/administrators who require asynchronous collaboration and knowledge sharing using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can systematically organize and share social studies project outcomes via blogs.
By utilizing feedback features, learners enhance content quality by over 20% through interaction with peers and instructors.
Learners optimize the visual composition of blogs (images, data visualizations, etc.) within technical constraints.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
